ygData.subject: Sean - Warrior only shield?
ygData.msgSnippet: hmm my mistake (whats new?)  The information came from a warrior who had the shield, he said nagafens lair ... maybe he purposely misled me?
ygData.messageBody:
hmm my mistake (whats new?) The information came from a warrior who had the
shield, he said nagafens lair ... maybe he purposely misled me?

>
> From: Sean Ross <sross@...>

> u have to kill the unicorn in lesser faydark to get the shield. the
> unicorn
> is lvl 45. the shield itselfs doubles as a weapon i think 9dm pierceing.

>
